name: localfiles
description: This is a web app that allows for customizing (metadata, cover art), managing and uploading local files to Spotify.

scripts.install-all: npm install && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd src/client && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd src/server && uvicorn app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd src/client && npm start"
